name: 李鎮宇
objective: This course introduces data science and data visualization through the R language. The course assumes no prior experience in R or data programming. Focusing on applied data science skills, students will be introduced to the methods to tidy, explore, transform, and visualize data. Students will practice them with real data in exercises and projects.
schedule:
Week. Dates: Content

I.Data Science
1. Introduction to the course, installation
2. Basic R Commands, packages
3. Data selection, Data formats
4. Workflows, comparisons
5. Data transformations
6. Functions, Iteration

II. Visualization
7. Data Preparation (Ch. 1)
8. Introduction to ggplot (Ch. 2)
9. Exam Week
10. Univariate Graphs (Ch. 3), Bivariate Graphs (Ch. 4)
11. Multivariate Graphs (Ch. 5), Maps (Ch. 6)
13. Time Series Graphs (Ch. 7), Statistical Models and Graphs (Ch. 8)

III. Practice
13. Project Time
14. Introduction to R libraries and modeling
15. Project Seminar
16. Last Class
17. Exam Week
